title: T-Play Bukit Batok: Transportation-Themed Indoor Playground
blurb: Indoor playground at HomeTeamNS Bukit Batok Clubhouse.
description: T-Play Bukit Batok is an indoor playground designed and conceptualized in Sweden, that adopts a Scandinavian theme. It is a playground crafted with intricate details to engage children in purposeful play. The playground is designed to allow children to develop in areas such as cognitive, emotional, social and physical through play. It includes various play areas and obstacles to provide a fun and engaging experience for children of different age groups. T-Play is suitable for children between the ages of 1 to 12 years old. It is a great place for families to spend quality time together and create lasting memories. The playground is safe and clean, and the staff are friendly and helpful. It is a perfect place for children to learn and grow through play.

Celebrate your birthday with us!

title: KidsSTOP™ - A Children's Science Museum in Singapore
blurb: Nurture your child’s love for Science through play!
description: KidsSTOP™ is designed to engage children aged 18 months to 8 years old in the world of Science through purposeful play. With a focus on hands-on activities and immersive exhibits, KidsSTOP™ offers a fun and interactive learning environment where children can explore, experiment, and discover new things. The exhibits are designed to stimulate curiosity and encourage children to ask questions, solve problems, and develop a deeper understanding of scientific concepts. KidsSTOP™ also offers a variety of educational programs and workshops that complement the exhibits and provide children with opportunities to learn and grow. It is a place where children can learn through play and develop a lifelong love for Science.

description: Kidztropic is a cozy indoor playground made just for little adventurers aged, where curiosity and creativity take center stage. While kids explore their world, parents can relax, chat, or simply soak in the joy of seeing their child’s delight. For family bonding, Kidztropic also hosts storytelling, workshops, and birthday-party events filled with fun and learning.

title: Joy of Toys: A Unique Family Play Experience
blurb: Fun recreational area for families to enjoy toys.

The Toddler Play Space is recommended for crawling babies and toddlers learning to walk. The Riding Room is recommended for short or add-on play, for beginning or confident walkers. Open daily from 10 AM to 8 PM. Remember to bring socks for children and accompanying adults! They provide family-friendly facilities for a fun and relaxing day.
